constructor with a deck size argument, initiates the pile Stack calls the generateCards() method
Deck(int, ArrayList<Card>) - Constructor for class Deck
Deck constructor for alternate main deck during view mode, passed an additional ArrayList of cards to keep track of the cards it needs to place in the player's rack right away.

getInput(int) - Method in class ComputerPlayer
AI version of getInput (main or discard).
getInput(int) - Method in class HumanPlayer
uses Spiegel InputReader package to get player input, dValue is current discard pile value, not used when a Human Player
getInput(int) - Method in class Player
This method gets the AI input for the first wave of decision making
getKeepOrNot(Card) - Method in class ComputerPlayer
AI version of getKeepOrNot(), determines if the card drawn from the main pile can be used, discards it if not.
getKeepOrNot(Card) - Method in class HumanPlayer
uses Spiegel InputReader package to get players input for keeping or discarding card drawn from main pile
getKeepOrNot(Card) - Method in class Player
This method gets AI decision from ComputerPlayer about keeping a card it has drawn from main
getSprite() - Method in class Animation
 
getSprite(int, int) - Method in class Sprite
used in various other sprite classes to get the subImages from a sprite sheet
getSwapInput(Card) - Method in class ComputerPlayer
AI version of getSwapInput(), finds the spot on the rack the temp Card (card in hand) needs to go by looking at its value and the boolean flags.
getSwapInput(Card) - Method in class HumanPlayer
uses Spiegel InputReader package to get players input for swap decision assigns temp card argument to current place holder variable
getSwapInput(Card) - Method in class Player
This method polls the AI to get which position in the rack it would like to swap with
getValue() - Method in class Card
basic getter
goalScore - Variable in class AliensRacko
target number of points to win the game
goalScorePanel - Variable in class AliensRacko
panel that holds the goal score, dissapears if single round game
goalScoreTextField - Variable in class AliensRacko
